messages.message:
“Dark side of the force” tactic:

- make the breaking change and wrap it in a try/catch
- in the catch use python’s introspection abilities to examine the function signature attempting to be called. If it matches the old style, fall back to that and then wrap the results in the necessary new structure

That allows us to clearly and unambiguously move to a new structure while handling, as a special case, translation to legacy structures
And could also allow us to notify the user
